direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle HTML entities but in opposite directions (unescaping vs. escaping).
The parseInput method uses the unescapeEntities method internally, indicating a dependency.
The parseFragment method may use the unescapeEntities method internally, indicating a dependency.
The parseXmlFragment method may use the unescapeEntities method internally, indicating a dependency.
The parseBodyFragment method may use the unescapeEntities method internally, indicating a dependency.
Both methods handle entity unescaping with similar control flows and exception handling.
